rukus.text: 39|53|Jibun no tamashī ni somuite ayamachi o okashita waga shimo be-tachi ni ie,`soredemo arrā no jihi ni taishite zetsubō shite wa naranai' arrā wa, hontōni subete no tsumi o yurusa reru. Kare wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
39|54|Anata gata wa chōbatsu ga kuru mae ni, omo ni kaigo shite kaeri, kare ni fukujū, kie shi nasai. Sono (chōbatsu ga yattekita)-gode wa, anata gata wa tasukaranai.
39|55|Anata gataga kidzukanai-chū, totsuzen chōbatsu ga yattekuru mae ni,-nushi kara anata gata ni kudasa reta mottomo yoi (michi) ni shitagae.
39|56|Tamashī ga ko no yō ni iwanai yō. “Ā nasakenai, watashi wa arrāhe (jibun no gimu o) okotatte ita. Hontōni watashi wa chōshō-sha no hitorideatta. ”
39|57|Matawa,“arrā ga watashi o, onmichibiki kudasa retanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu omo o osoreta mono o. ” To iwanai yō.
39|58|Mata chōbatsu o mita toki,“watashi ka mōichido (gense ni) kaererunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu yoi okonai o suru mono no hitori ni narudearou. ” To iwanai yō.
39|59|Iya sōde wanai. Tashikani waga shirushi wa kudatta nodearo. Daga anata gata wa sore o usodearu to shita. Soshite kōman de fushinjin'na hitori to natta.'
39|60|Shinpan no hi, anata wa arrā ni taishi kyogi o katatta-sha-tachi o miyou. Kare-ra no kao wa kuroku kawarudearou. Jigoku ni wa, kōman'na mono no sumai ga nai to iu no ka.
39|61|Daga arrā wa,-nushi o osoreta mono o antaina basho ni sukuu. Kare-ra wa saiyaku ni au koto mo naku, urei mo nai.
39|62|Arrā wa, subete no mono no sōzō-shadeari, mata subete no mono no kanrishadearu.
39|63|Ten to ji no kagi wa arrā no yūdearu. Kare no shirushi o kyohi shita mono koso shippai-shadearu.
